author: admin
title: Zila Panchayat Chhattisgarh Recruitment 2017 Jobs 270 Sahayak Applications
text: How to Apply for Zila Panchayat Vacancy ? Candidates who are interested can apply for Zila Panchayat Chhattisgarh Jobs through official website that is bilaspur.gov.in. Now you will reach the home page of it, and then hit on “Recruitments” tab visible at the top in menu bar. A new page will be opened with various job links you need to select appropriate link of Advertisement of the post that is “Village employment advertisement for recruitment to the post of Assistant Chief Executive Officer, Zilla Panchayat office district Bilaspur Chhattisgarh” link. A new window will be displayed with PDF file which contains all the information about the post on your screen. Read all the details about post and download the format attached below the notification. After reading complete details download application form and take a print out of it. Fill your application form with all the details and affix your recent passport size photo on in space provided. Now prepare an envelope and must be super-script with the name of the posts and place application form along with all the documents in it. Lastly send it to address mentioned below.
